title: No ward skin button in champ select
body:
I noticed how there are some problems with ward skins this patch but I was just wondering if a problem I'm having is related to the same ward skin issue. so the problem I'm having is when in champ select the button that is normally there to change and view my ward skins is not there at all its not just invisible either I already tried clicking where the button should be and it's not that occasional formatting bug that sometimes moves all text, box's, bans, etc. to the abyss (which is usually fixed by resizing the client).

so to recap I enter champ select there is no ward skin button at all. Is it related to the current ward skin bug being looked at if not here's a new bug and plz help.

replies.body:
This issue is *in fact, * related to the ward skin display issue that's been going on lately. The button completely disappears if you've previously selected one of the skins that don't currently show up in the client in champ select, which as a result, prevents the ward selection button from displaying. Unfortunately, there's no fix at the moment, so you'll be stuck with the currently selected ward skin until we're able to roll out a fix for this.

I don't have a date on when that fix will roll out, but please let me know if you have any other questions.
yeah, I also have the same issue, ty for your continued effort rito :)
Having the exact same issue! But weirdly my boyfriend is able to select ward skins... It's pretty friggen irritating.
